sqlMap.statement:
SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO" , IntfId as "INTFID" , WorkGrpCd as "WORKGRPCD" , Level4 as "LEVEL4" , BjobMsgScheID as "BJOBMSGSCHEID" , IntfName as "INTFNAME" , BatchType as "BATCHTYPE" , BjobDmndMsgID as "BJOBDMNDMSGID" , errYn as "ERRYN" , MsgCnt as "MSGCNT" , SndStartDate as "SNDSTARTDATE" , IntfIdEndDate as "INTFIDENDDATE" , SchedulTime as "SCHEDULTIME" , IntfEndDate as "INTFENDDATE" , CheckName as "CHECKNAME" , DelYn as "DELYN" , CheckBaseDate as "CHECKBASEDATE" , CheckRowCnt as "CHECKROWCNT" , SndLineCnt as "SNDLINECNT" , RcvLineCnt as "RCVLINECNT" , ScheKind as "SCHEKIND" , EventCallVal as "EVENTCALLVAL" , fileTrsmtSizeCtnt as "FILETRSMTSIZECTNT" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.WorkGrpCd, A.IntfId, C.SndStartDate DESC) ROWNO, A.WorkGrpCd, A.IntfId, A.Level4, COALESCE(B.BjobMsgScheID,'') AS BjobMsgScheID, A.IntfName, A.BatchType, C.BjobDmndMsgID, C.errYn, (SELECT COUNT(BjobMsgScheID) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 WHERE IntfId=A.IntfId AND MsgRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# ) AS MsgCnt, C.SndStartDate, C.IntfIdEndDate, SUBSTR(B.SndrcvStartHMS,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(B.SndrcvStartHMS,3,2)|| '~' || SUBSTR(B.SndrcvEndHMS,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(B.SndrcvEndHMS,3,2) AS SchedulTime, A.IntfEndDate, (SELECT CheckName FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 WHERE AdptrCd=A.SndAdptrCd AND AdptrCdSeq=A.SndAdptrCdSeq) AS CheckName, A.DelYn , C.CheckBaseDate, C.CheckRowCnt, C.SndLineCnt, C.RcvLineCnt, B.ScheKind, A.EventCallVal, D.fileTrsmtSizeCtnt FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TB1.BjobMsgScheID, TB2.intfId, TB1.SndrcvStartHMS, TB1.SndrcvEndHMS, TB1.scheKind FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 TB1, $schemaId$.TSEAIES09 TB2 WHERE TB1.BjobMsgScheID = TB2.BjobMsgScheID AND TB1.ThisMsgUseYn = '1' ) B ON A.intfId=B.intfId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.intfId, T1.BjobDmndMsgID, COALESCE(T1.ErrYn,'N') AS ErrYn, T1.sndStartDate, T1.intfIdEndDate, T1.checkBaseDate, T1.checkRowCnt, T1.sndLineCnt, T1.rcvLineCnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY T1.intfId ORDER BY T1.msgRegDate DESC ) RN FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 T1 WHERE msgRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# ) AS TB WHERE RN = 1 ) C ON A.intfId=C.intfId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.intfId, T2.fileTrsmtSizeCtnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.intfId AS intfId , T1.BjobDmndMsgID, row_number() over(partition by T1.intfId order by T1.msgRegDate desc ) rn FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 T1 WHERE T1.msgRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# ) AS TB WHERE rn = 1 ) T1, $schemaId$.TSEAIES03 T2 WHERE T1.intfId = T2.intfId AND T1.BjobDmndMsgID=T2.BjobDmndMsgID AND T2.sndRcvKind='1' ) D ON A.intfId=D.intfId WHERE A.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.delYn = #searchDelYn#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
COALESCE(C.errYn,'N') = #searchErrorVal#
( A.intfName LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' OR A.intfId LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' )
ORDER BY ROWNO ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(A.intfId) AS "TOTALCOUNT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tb1.BjobMsgScheID, tb2.intfId, tb1.SndrcvStartHMS, tb1.SndrcvEndHMS, tb1.scheKind FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES07 tb1 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIES09 tb2 ON tb1.BjobMsgScheID = tb2.BjobMsgScheID ) B ON A.IntfId=B.IntfId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.intfId, T1.BjobDmndMsgID, T1.errYn, T1.sndStartDate, T1.intfIdEndDate, T1.checkBaseDate, T1.checkRowCnt, T1.sndLineCnt, T1.rcvLineCnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY T1.intfId ORDER BY T1.msgRegDate DESC ) RN FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 T1 WHERE msgRegDate BETWEEN #searchStartTime# AND #searchEndTime# ) AS TB WHERE RN = 1 ) C ON A.IntfId=C.IntfId WHERE A.workGrpCd IN (SELECT EAIBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE userID = #loginEmpno# )
A.workGrpCd = #searchEaiBzwkDstcd#
A.delYn = #searchDelYn#
A.batchType = #searchBatchType#
COALESCE(C.errYn,'N') = #searchErrorVal#
( A.intfName LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' OR A.intfId LIKE '%' || #searchInterfaceNm# || '%' )
